H0.text: Who did Top of the Pops mistakenly portray in a Dexys Midnight Runners song. Alex Higgins

H1.text: Who did Top of the Pops mistakenly portray in a Dexys Midnight Runners song. George Best

H2.text: Who did Top of the Pops mistakenly portray in a Dexys Midnight Runners song. Eric Bristow

H3.text: Who did Top of the Pops mistakenly portray in a Dexys Midnight Runners song. Jocky Wilson

A4.text: When the band performed this single on the BBC TV music show Top of the Pops, instead of a picture of Jackie Wilson, the American soul singer, for a joke the band performed in front of a photo of Jocky Wilson, the Scottish darts player.
